item.title: Habits
item.author: Pranesh Srinivasan
item.description: Truly great things require consistent, long term effort inspired by purpose and driven by progress1. It is even more of an uphill task when micro progress may be incremental and hard to measure – how much weight have you lost since that last gym session, or perhaps how much better of an artist are you after that last painting, or even how much better is that savings account because of that coffee you made yourself this morning?
